original_title: WWE Villains of The Squared Circle
overview: The most memorable rule benders and rule breakers of the 1980s are all here, as Mean Gene Okerlund and Bobby "The Brain" Heenan host Villains of the Squared Circle. In this exclusive presentation, witness Andr√© the Giant meet Ernie Ladd in singles competition, Jake "The Snake" Roberts in action against Scott McGhee, and much more!
tagline: WWE's notorious stars in their most infamous moments!
title: WWE Villains of The Squared Circle
